title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin plus 1\4 twill
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 24.5 x 38 cm (9 5/8 x 14 15/16 in.)
description: Continuous ogival framework of broad checkered bands drawn together by crowns and a leaf pattern. Ogives enclose a palmette in one horizontal row and a fruiting tree in the next. In a coarse yellow satin on a ground of red weft twill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century.Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin plus 1\4 twill. 1953-162-35.
